name: 3 - MyRunner
description:
MyRunner is a small basic platformer made alone in about 1 week.

It is a 1rst year EPITECH (5years IT engineer school) project made on fedora 32 Linux using the CSFML library.

This project can also be git cloned/pulled from https://github.com/EpitechIT2020/B-MUL-100-REN-1-1-myrunner-dorian.ayoul.
